languages.text: "Глейто не домашнее животное, Вольный Торговец, подкармливать его бесполезно. Он ест только из моих рук и в строго отведенное время — иного дрессура не позволит. Исключает предумышленное отравление и другие попытки навредить кибермастифу. Одним словом — не тратьте время и мясо".

"Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."
languages.original_text: "Глейто не домашнее животное, Вольный Торговец, подкармливать его бесполезно. Он ест только из моих рук и в строго отведенное время — иного дрессура не позволит. Исключает предумышленное отравление и другие попытки навредить кибермастифу. Одним словом — не тратьте время и мясо".

It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

"Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

languages.text: 「グライトはペットではありませんよ、ローグトレーダー。エサを与えようとしても無駄です。彼は私の手から、決められた時間にだけ食べます。厳しい訓練の成果です。サイバーマスチフを、毒殺や悪意ある干渉から守るためです。要するに、時間も肉も無駄にしないでください」
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトはペットではありませんよ、ローグトレーダー。エサを与えようとしても無駄です。彼は私の手から、決められた時間にだけ食べます。厳しい訓練の成果です。サイバーマスチフを、毒殺や悪意ある干渉から守るためです。要するに、時間も肉も無駄にしないでください」

languages.text: "Glaito ist kein Haustier, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} – ihn zu füttern, bringt Euch nicht weiter. Er frisst nur aus meiner Hand, und das nur zu ganz bestimmten Zeiten – striktes Training. Es schützt den Cyber-Mastiff vor gezielter Vergiftung und anderen bösen Absichten. Vergeudet besser nicht Eure Zeit oder Euer Fleisch."
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito ist kein Haustier, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} – ihn zu füttern, bringt Euch nicht weiter. Er frisst nur aus meiner Hand, und das nur zu ganz bestimmten Zeiten – striktes Training. Es schützt den Cyber-Mastiff vor gezielter Vergiftung und anderen bösen Absichten. Vergeudet besser nicht Eure Zeit oder Euer Fleisch."

languages.text: « Glaito n'est pas un animal de compagnie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous n'arriverez à rien en essayant de le nourrir. Il a été entraîné à n'accepter la nourriture que de ma main et à heure précise, afin d'éviter toute tentative d'empoisonnement ou d'élimination. Alors, ne perdez pas votre temps et ne gâchez pas votre nourriture. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito n'est pas un animal de compagnie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous n'arriverez à rien en essayant de le nourrir. Il a été entraîné à n'accepter la nourriture que de ma main et à heure précise, afin d'éviter toute tentative d'empoisonnement ou d'élimination. Alors, ne perdez pas votre temps et ne gâchez pas votre nourriture. »

languages.text: «Glaito no es una mascota doméstica, Comerciante Independiente: intentar ganarse su confianza con golosinas no le llevará a ninguna parte. Solo come de mi mano y únicamente en momentos específicos; ha sido adiestrado para ello. De esta manera se protege al cibermastín contra envenenamientos deliberados y otras agresiones. Básicamente, no malgaste tiempo ni carne».
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito no es una mascota doméstica, Comerciante Independiente: intentar ganarse su confianza con golosinas no le llevará a ninguna parte. Solo come de mi mano y únicamente en momentos específicos; ha sido adiestrado para ello. De esta manera se protege al cibermastín contra envenenamientos deliberados y otras agresiones. Básicamente, no malgaste tiempo ni carne».

languages.text: “格雷托不是宠物，行商浪人，喂它东西不会有任何结果。它只会在特定的时间段内，吃我喂给它的东西。这是严格训练的结果，这么做可以保护生化獒犬免遭投毒或是其他伤害。总之，不要再浪费你的时间和肉干了。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托不是宠物，行商浪人，喂它东西不会有任何结果。它只会在特定的时间段内，吃我喂给它的东西。这是严格训练的结果，这么做可以保护生化獒犬免遭投毒或是其他伤害。总之，不要再浪费你的时间和肉干了。”

languages.text: "Glaito bir evcil hayvan değildir Hür Tacir. Onu beslemeye çalışmak boşa kürek çekmektir. Yalnızca benim elimden ve belli başlı zamanlarda yer. Katı eğitim. Böylece siber mastif, kasıtlı zehirlenmelerden ve başka kötü niyetli eylemlerden korunur. Kısacası vaktinizi de etinizi de boşa harcamayın."
languages.original_text: "Glaito is not a house pet, Rogue Trader — trying to feed him will get you nowhere. He only eats out of my hands and only at specific times — strict training. It protects the cyber-mastiff against deliberate poisoning and other ill intents. Basically, don't waste your time, or your meat."
